alert.note: Alert for Colfax (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:44PM MDT until June 22 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Colfax County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 443 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Maxwell, or 9 miles northwest of Springer, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Maxwell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 417 and 437. Highway 64 between Mile Markers 311 and 322. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing lots of hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Accumulations of hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.
